title: Danny MacAskill Does a Wheelie
content:
As one of the top trials riders in the world, Danny MacAskill can certainly do a wheelie. In this fun video, he does wheelies all over the place, joined by a bunch of friends. The behind-the-scenes video is just as fun. And I watched the â€œhow to do a wheelieâ€ companion video with interest because Iâ€™ve never been able to do a wheelie on a bike for more than a couple of seconds and itâ€™s probably time to learn â€” even though a manual would be more useful for mountain biking.
